channel.title: Rabbit-Os on Dino-s26

item.title: Is 'HER' become reality ?, R1 Companion Device
item.description:
Intermezzo

You guys remember there’s movie called “HER”, where the protagonis Theodore Twombly the introvert letter writer decide to buy OS1, an AI first OS which somehow Theodore become attached to the AI. While he try to understand the AI (aka Samantha), he also going through divorce with his wife, which is sad but somehow, day by day Theodore become attached to Samantha until one day Samantha become self aware and then it leave Theodore.
